text: Ivato International Airport is the main international airport serving Antananarivo, the capital of Madagascar, located 16 km northwest of the city centre. Ivato Airport is the main hub for Air Madagascar. ==Airlines and destinations== Turkish Airlines to and from Istanbul makes a stop over in Mauritius. However, Turkish Airlines has no traffic rights between Antananarivo and Mauritius. Air Madagascar operates to Guangzhou with a stop over in Reunion. ==References== ==External links== *(Madagascar Airport Departures Arrivals live) * * * * Category:Airports in Madagascar Category:Buildings and structures in Antananarivo
title: Ivato International Airport
